price: 74. Ne se repentiront-ils donc pas auprès d’Allah ? N’imploreront-ils pas Son pardon ? Car Allah est, certes, Absoluteur et Tout Miséricordieux.
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatūbūna ilā al-lahi wayastaghfirūnahu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
